attributes.review: I downloaded the app & it started glitching immediately. Next thing you know my saved credit cards & Apple Pay were charged by the Frito-Lay company. I know how mr. frump loves to use Cheetos as his foundation, but I had no idea he would charge my cards for his pleasure! I tried to close out of the app & it just kept shouting grab her by the p u s i & chi nah. Very disturbed by this app. Do not download
attributes.title: Almost broke my phone

attributes.review: Bad app overall takes up too much space honestly not good. I get on the app and the first thing I see is is the freaking Lorax with a wig on. It was really looking weird then it tried to take me to bad websites that would not be appropriate for kids or adults. Apparently it says if u get the app then u have to be able to name 5 WNBA players so I jus deleted it. Anyways don’t get it and #edp2020

I am an old white man so the App Store will probably take me seriously. This app is appalling!!! It took all my personal information and in return sent me hate mail and pictures of a disgusting looking man that somehow is the president?!?! Truly disgusting please take this app down it is not fit for children or adults. I would give this app zero if it were possible.
attributes.title: white people against trump

attributes.review:
I opened this app and it went to a picture of this orange monster! barf! i cant believe someone designed the app to open like that, maybe it’s a glitch. They should definitely fix that, then maybe the app wouldn’t have such horrible reviews!

would give the app 5/5⭐️ in my sleep✨🌈💓🧚🏻‍♀️🦋 but since i’m awake 1/5⭐️ ✨🌈🧜‍♀️💓🥰🐬

- sincerely a gen z vote that you never had mr cheeto✨💓🌈🦋🐬✨💓
attributes.title: worst app ever, do not download

attributes.review: First off this app had HORRIBLE glitching problems. It would glitch MULTIPLE times a day when I didn’t use the the app. The next thing was that trump was on the first page like WHAT?!? I don’t know what is even happening with old Cheeto dude. Anyway this app is horrible, terrible, and disgusting, would not recommend to ANYONE not even to the fire nation 😳. So no this app is simply a no.
attributes.title: No no no 🤬

attributes.review: someone told me this was a great app so i went ahead and downloaded it but as soon as i opened the app i saw a racist orange guy waving his hand in the air looking at who knows what then i looked at his hair and it looked like corn hairs. i have never been so disappointed from an app like i was from this one 😣😣 i hope one day i can forget the horrible lorax with no mustache looking thing that i saw 😔🤢
attributes.title: Traumatic

attributes.review: This app cyber bullies my grandchildren. It sends them notifications non-stop of brutal, horrifically violent images and messages calling them ugly. I downloaded this app to see what was going on and it started to do the same for me! My grandchildren actually ended up disappearing under mysterious circumstances after complaining that this app was going to take them. For your own safety—DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: i was on next door when i heard some ✨AMAZING✨ things about this app. i got it only to discover, it the man inside chester the cheetahs suit! heartbreak. do NOT recommend, it was given one star because i like cheetos. but only puffed. good thing this strange man is puffed. i do believe the app knows my whole country is built on the site of murdered people because it just was not working. what a shame!
attributes.title: broken???

attributes.review: NEVER GET THIS APP. hours after i downloaded this app my mother died by TURNING INTO A CHEETO, followed by my brother, dad, and the rest of my family. i was devastated so i went to look for solace by spending time with the last live person in my family, my fish. but when i got there it was too late, HE HAD ALREADY TRANSFORMED TOO.  THIS APP HAS RUINED MY LIFE. please pray for me, for i fear that i, too, will eventually become one of them as well.
attributes.title: oh my god 😰

attributes.review: the things i’ve seen on this app will haunt me forever. i downloaded the app expecting to see MY president of course but all i was met with were MULTIPLE horrifying videos and pictures of murder and racism. i started crying from pure shock as all i wanted to do was vote for the greatest hottest skinniest orangest man that i know of. extremely disappointed. you have lost my vote for president, get ur act together.
attributes.title: terrifying and scarring
